content: And our financial performance was also strong in the third quarter, with sequential improvements on four key metrics, transaction recovery improved by 2 points, revenue recovery improved by 7 points, adjusted EBITDA fall-through improved by 4 points, and we reduced our cash usage by 36% as compared to Q2 2022. Our third quarter performance and our current recovery trends give us confidence we will finish the year in line with our previously issued guidance, which called for full year 2022 revenue of $1.8 billion to $1.85 billion and Adjusted EBITDA of $90 million to $100 million.
